books.title: A Spell for Chameleon
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: The first book in the Xanth series introduces us to Bink, who appears to have no magical talent in a land where magic is everything. Banished from Xanth, Bink sets out on a quest to discover his true magical ability.

books.title: The Source of Magic
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: In the second Xanth novel, Bink embarks on a dangerous quest to find the source of all magic in Xanth, a journey that will take him to the most perilous corners of the magical land.

books.title: Castle Roogna
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: The third Xanth novel follows Dor, Bink's son, who is sent back in time to Castle Roogna to find a magical restorative for the zombie Jonathan. In the past, he encounters dangers and adventures in a very different Xanth.

books.title: Centaur Aisle
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: In the fourth book of the Xanth series, King Dor and his friends must journey to Mundania to rescue the missing King Trent and Queen Iris. Their quest takes them through the dangerous centaur aisle, a magical passage between worlds.

books.title: Ogre, Ogre
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: The fifth Xanth novel centers on Smash the half-ogre, who sets out on a quest to help a human woman named Tandy find safety. Along the way, he encounters various magical creatures and discovers his own unique talents.

books.title: Night Mare
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: In the sixth book of the Xanth series, the Night Mare Imbri, who delivers bad dreams, becomes involved in Xanth politics when the nextwave of invaders threatens the magical land. She must help find the next King of Xanth before it's too late.

books.title: Dragon on a Pedestal
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: The seventh Xanth novel follows Ivy, the young daughter of King Dor, who gets lost in the jungle with only her special dragon companion. Meanwhile, the dreaded Gap Dragon has somehow been transformed into a tiny dragon and is also lost in the wilds of Xanth.

books.title: Crewel Lye: A Caustic Yarn
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: The eighth book in the Xanth series tells the story of Jordan the Ghost, who recounts his tragic tale to Ivy. His story involves betrayal, a magic sword, and a caustic lie that led to his untimely demise centuries ago.

books.title: Golem in the Gears
books.author: Piers Anthony
books.description: In the ninth Xanth novel, Grundy Golem, who was once a tiny creature conjured to entertain a child, sets out on a quest to win the heart of Rapunzel, a beautiful half-nymph, half-human girl with very long hair.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter's life is miserable. His parents are dead and he's stuck with his heartless relatives, who force him to live in a tiny closet under the stairs. But his fortune changes when he receives a letter that tells him the truth about himself: he's a wizard.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Chamber of Secrets
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The Dursleys were so mean and hideous that summer that all Harry Potter wanted was to get back to the Hogwarts School for Witchcraft and Wizardry. But just as he's packing his bags, Harry receives a warning from a strange, impish creature named Dobby who says that if Harry Potter returns to Hogwarts, disaster will strike.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter, along with his best friends, Ron and Hermione, is about to start his third year at Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry. Harry can't wait to get back to school after the summer holidays. But when Harry gets to Hogwarts, the atmosphere is tense.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: Harry Potter is midway through his training as a wizard and his coming of age. Harry wants to get away from the pernicious Dursleys and go to the International Quidditch Cup. He wants to find out about the mysterious event that's supposed to take place at Hogwarts this year.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Order of the Phoenix
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: There is a door at the end of a silent corridor. And it's haunting Harry Potter's dreams. Why else would he be waking in the middle of the night, screaming in terror? It's not just the upcoming O.W.L. exams; a new teacher with a personality like poisoned honey; a venomous, disgruntled house-elf; or even the growing threat of He-Who-Must-Not-Be-Named.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Half-Blood Prince
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: The war against Voldemort is not going well; even Muggle governments are noticing. Ron scans the obituary pages of the Daily Prophet, looking for familiar names. Dumbledore is absent from Hogwarts for long stretches of time, and the Order of the Phoenix has already suffered losses.

books.title: Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows
books.author: J.K. Rowling
books.description: As he climbs into the sidecar of Hagrid's motorbike and takes to the skies, leaving Privet Drive for the last time, Harry Potter knows that Lord Voldemort and the Death Eaters are not far behind. The protective charm that has kept Harry safe until now is broken, but he cannot keep hiding.

books.title: Wool
books.author: Hugh Howey
books.description: In a ruined and toxic future, a community exists in a giant silo underground, hundreds of stories deep. There, men and women live in a society full of regulations they believe are meant to protect them.

books.title: Shift
books.author: Hugh Howey
books.description: In 2007, the Center for Automation in Nanobiotech outlined the hardware and software needed to create the first generation of nanobots. Shortly after, the commission warned against possible dangers of this technology.

books.title: Dungeon Crawler Carl
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: A game of survival in a dungeon crawl where the stakes are high and the penalties are permanent. Carl and his ex-girlfriend's cat Princess Donut must fight their way through a deadly dungeon that's as bizarre as it is lethal.

books.title: Carl's Doomsday Scenario
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: The second book in the Dungeon Crawler Carl series follows Carl and Princess Donut as they continue their deadly game show journey deeper into the dungeon, facing increasingly bizarre challenges and deadly monsters.

books.title: The Dungeon Anarchist's Cookbook
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: In the third installment, Carl and Princess Donut delve deeper into the dungeon, where they encounter new allies, deadlier enemies, and increasingly complex game mechanics as they fight for their survival and revenge.

books.title: The Gate of the Feral Gods
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: Book four finds Carl and Princess Donut facing their greatest challenges yet as they approach the Gate of the Feral Gods. The stakes are higher, the monsters are deadlier, and the game show producers are more sadistic than ever.

books.title: The Butcher's Masquerade
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: In the fifth book, Carl and Princess Donut find themselves at a deadly masquerade ball where the entertainment is murder and the guests are the most dangerous creatures in the dungeon. They must navigate political intrigue and deadly combat to survive.

books.title: The Eye of the Bedlam Bride
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: The sixth book in the series sees Carl and Princess Donut facing new challenges as they encounter the mysterious Bedlam Bride. They must overcome their greatest obstacles yet to continue their journey through the deadly dungeon.

books.title: The Inevitable Ruin
books.author: Matt Dinniman
books.description: In the seventh installment, Carl and Princess Donut face The Inevitable Ruin, where they confront powerful enemies and discover shocking secrets about the dungeon's history that threaten not just their survival but their entire world.

books.title: The Eye of the World
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and go, leaving memories that become legend. Legend fades to myth, and even myth is long forgotten when the Age that gave it birth returns again.

books.title: The Great Hunt
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The Wheel of Time turns and Ages come and pass. What was, what will be, and what is, may yet fall under the Shadow. For centuries, gleemen have told of The Great Hunt of the Horn. Now the Horn itself is found: the Horn of Valere long thought only legend, the Horn which will raise the dead heroes of the ages.

books.title: The Dragon Reborn
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The Dragon Reborn—the leader long prophesied who will save the world, but in the saving destroy it; the savior who will run mad and kill all those dearest to him—is on the run from his destiny.

books.title: The Shadow Rising
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The seals of Shayol Ghul are weak now, and the Dark One reaches out. The Shadow is rising to cover humankind. In Tar Valon, Min sees portents of hideous doom. Will the White Tower itself be broken?

books.title: The Fires of Heaven
books.author: Robert Jordan
books.description: The bonds and wards that hold the Great Lord of the Dark are slowly failing, but still his fragile prison holds. The Forsaken, immortal servants of the shadow, weave their snares and tighten their grip upon the realms of men, sure in the knowledge that their master will soon break free.

books.title: Pawn of Prophecy
books.author: David Eddings
books.description: Long ago, the Storyteller claimed, in this first book of THE BELGARIAD, the evil god Torak drove men and Gods to war. But Belgarath the Sorcerer led men to reclaim the Orb that protected men of the West.

books.title: Queen of Sorcery
books.author: David Eddings
books.description: The master Sorcerer Belgarath and his daughter Polgara the arch-Sorceress were on the trail of the Orb, seeking to regain its saving power before the final disaster prophesized by the legends. And with them went Garion, a simple farm boy only months before, but now the focus of the struggle.

books.title: Magician's Gambit
books.author: David Eddings
books.description: Ce'Nedra, Imperial Princess of Tolnedra, had joined a dangerous mission to recover the stolen Orb that supposedly protected the West from the evil God Torak. And somehow, she found herself feeling quite tender for Garion, the innocent farm boy, who would be forced into the strange tower in the center of all evil to retrieve the Orb by himself.

books.title: Castle of Wizardry
books.author: David Eddings
books.description: It had all begun with the theft of the Orb that had so long protected the West from the evil God Torak. Before that, Garion had been a simple farm boy. Afterward, he discovered that his aunt was really the Sorceress Polgara and his grandfather was Belgarath, the Eternal Man.

books.title: Enchanters' End Game
books.author: David Eddings
books.description: The quest was over. The Orb of Aldur was restored. And once again, with the crowning of Garion, there was a descendant of Riva Iron-grip to rule as Overlord of the West. But the Prophecy was unfulfilled. In the east, the evil God Torak was about to awaken and seek dominion.

books.title: The Redemption of Althalus
books.author: David Eddings
books.description: It would be sheer folly to try to conceal the true nature of Althalus, for his flaws are the stuff of legend. He is, as all men know, a thief, a liar, an occasional murderer, an outrageous braggart, and a man devoid of even the slightest hint of honor.

books.title: Clean Architecture
books.author: Robert C. Martin
books.description: By applying universal rules of software architecture, you can dramatically improve developer productivity throughout the life of any software system. Now, building upon the success of his best-selling books Clean Code and The Clean Coder, legendary software craftsman Robert C. Martin ("Uncle Bob") reveals those rules and helps you apply them.

books.title: Multipliers
books.author: Liz Wiseman
books.description: Are you a genius or a genius maker? We've all had experience with two dramatically different types of leaders. The first type drain intelligence, energy, and capability from the ones around them and always need to be the smartest ones in the room. These are the idea killers, the energy sappers, the diminishers of talent and commitment.

books.title: The C++ Programming Language
books.author: Bjarne Stroustrup
books.description: The new C++11 standard allows programmers to express ideas more clearly, simply, and directly, and to write faster, more efficient code. Bjarne Stroustrup, the designer and original implementer of C++, thoroughly covers the details of this language and its use in his definitive reference, The C++ Programming Language, Fourth Edition.

books.title: World War Z
books.author: Max Brooks
books.description: The Zombie War came unthinkably close to eradicating humanity. Max Brooks, driven by the urgency of preserving the acid-etched first-hand experiences of the survivors from those apocalyptic years, traveled across the United States of America and throughout the world, from decimated cities that once teemed with upwards of thirty million souls to the most remote and inhospitable areas of the planet.

books.title: The Hobbit
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: Bilbo Baggins is a hobbit who enjoys a comfortable, unambitious life, rarely traveling any farther than his pantry or cellar. But his contentment is disturbed when the wizard Gandalf and a company of dwarves arrive on his doorstep.

books.title: The Fellowship of the Ring
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: One Ring to rule them all, One Ring to find them, One Ring to bring them all and in the darkness bind them. In ancient times the Rings of Power were crafted by the Elven-smiths, and Sauron, the Dark Lord, forged the One Ring.

books.title: The Two Towers
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The Fellowship is scattered. Some prepare for war against the Dark Lord. Some fight against the treachery of the corrupt wizard Saruman. Only Frodo and Sam are left to take the One Ring to be destroyed in the fires of Mount Doom.

books.title: The Return of the King
books.author: J.R.R. Tolkien
books.description: The armies of the Dark Lord are massing as his evil shadow spreads across the land. Men, Dwarves, Elves and Ents unite forces to battle against the Dark. Meanwhile, Frodo and Sam struggle further into Mordor in their heroic quest to destroy the One Ring.

books.title: We Are Legion (We Are Bob)
books.author: Dennis E. Taylor
books.description: Bob Johansson has just sold his software company and is looking forward to a life of leisure. There are places to go, books to read, and movies to watch. So it's a little unfair when he gets himself killed crossing the street.

books.title: For We Are Many
books.author: Dennis E. Taylor
books.description: Bob Johansson didn't believe in an afterlife, so waking up after being killed in a car accident was a shock. To add to the surprise, he is now a sentient computer and the controlling intelligence for a Von Neumann probe.

books.title: All These Worlds
books.author: Dennis E. Taylor
books.description: Being a sentient spaceship really should be more fun. But after spreading out through space for almost a century, Bob and his clones just can't stay out of trouble.

books.title: Heaven's River
books.author: Dennis E. Taylor
books.description: More than a hundred years ago, Bender set out for the stars and was never heard from again. There has been no trace of him despite numerous searches by his clone-mates. Now Bob is determined to organize an expedition to learn Bender's fate—whatever the cost.

books.title: Project Hail Mary
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: Ryland Grace is the sole survivor on a desperate, last-chance mission—and if he fails, humanity and the Earth itself will perish. Except that right now, he doesn't know that.

books.title: The Martian
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: Six days ago, astronaut Mark Watney became one of the first people to walk on Mars. Now, he's sure he'll be the first person to die there. After a dust storm nearly kills him and forces his crew to evacuate while thinking him dead, Mark finds himself stranded.

books.title: Ready Player One
books.author: Ernest Cline
books.description: In the year 2045, reality is an ugly place. The only time Wade Watts really feels alive is when he's jacked into the OASIS, a vast virtual world where most of humanity spends their days.

books.title: Ready Player Two
books.author: Ernest Cline
books.description: Days after winning OASIS founder James Halliday's contest, Wade Watts makes a discovery that changes everything. Hidden within Halliday's vaults, waiting for his heir to find, lies a technological advancement.

books.title: Speaker for the Dead
books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.description: In the aftermath of his terrible war, Ender Wiggin disappeared, and a powerful voice arose: The Speaker for the Dead, who told the true story of the Bugger War.

books.title: Ender's Game
books.author: Orson Scott Card
books.description: Andrew 'Ender' Wiggin thinks he is playing computer simulated war games; he is, in fact, engaged in something far more desperate. The result of genetic experimentation, Ender may be the military genius Earth desperately needs.

books.title: The Light of Other Days
books.author: Arthur C. Clarke & Stephen Baxter
books.description: When a brilliant, driven industrialist harnesses the cutting edge of quantum physics to enable people everywhere to see one another at all times, it seems like the logical extension of the modern telecommunications system.

books.title: The Hero of Ages
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: To end the Final Empire and restore freedom, Vin killed the Lord Ruler. But as a result, the Deepness—the lethal form of the ubiquitous mists—is back, along with increasingly heavy ashfalls and ever more powerful earthquakes.

books.title: Cryptonomicon
books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: In 1942, Lawrence Pritchard Waterhouse—mathematical genius and young Captain in the U.S. Navy—is assigned to detachment 2702. It is an outfit so secret that only a handful of people know it exists, and some of those people have names like Churchill and Roosevelt.

books.title: The Diamond Age
books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: The Diamond Age: Or, A Young Lady's Illustrated Primer is a postcyberpunk novel by Neal Stephenson. It is to some extent a science fiction coming-of-age story, focused on a young girl named Nell.

books.title: Rhythm of War
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: After forming a coalition of human resistance against the enemy invasion, Dalinar Kholin and his Knights Radiant have spent a year fighting a protracted, brutal war.

books.title: Snow Crash
books.author: Neal Stephenson
books.description: In reality, Hiro Protagonist delivers pizza for Uncle Enzo's CosaNostra Pizza Inc., but in the Metaverse he's a warrior prince. Plunging headlong into the enigma of a new computer virus that's striking down hackers everywhere.

books.title: Oathbringer
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The Alethi armies commanded by Dalinar Kholin won a fleeting victory at a terrible cost: The enemy Parshendi summoned the violent Everstorm, which now sweeps the world with destruction, and in its passing awakens the once peaceful and subservient parshmen to the horror of their millennia-long enslavement by humans.

books.title: The Way of Kings
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: Roshar is a world of stone and storms. Uncanny tempests of incredible power sweep across the rocky terrain so frequently that they have shaped ecology and civilization alike.

books.title: The Wise Man's Fear
books.author: Patrick Rothfuss
books.description: My name is Kvothe. I have stolen princesses back from sleeping barrow kings. I burned down the town of Trebon. I have spent the night with Felurian and left with both my sanity and my life. I was expelled from the University at a younger age than most people are allowed in. I tread paths by moonlight that others fear to speak of during day. I have talked to Gods, loved women, and written songs that make the minstrels weep.

books.title: The Name of the Wind
books.author: Patrick Rothfuss
books.description: My name is Kvothe. I have stolen princesses back from sleeping barrow kings. I burned down the town of Trebon. I have spent the night with Felurian and left with both my sanity and my life. I was expelled from the University at a younger age than most people are allowed in. I tread paths by moonlight that others fear to speak of during day. I have talked to Gods, loved women, and written songs that make the minstrels weep.

books.title: The Well of Ascension
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: The impossible has been accomplished. The Lord Ruler – the man who claimed to be god incarnate and brutally ruled the world for a thousand years – has been vanquished. But Kelsier, the hero who masterminded that triumph, is dead too, and now the awesome task of building a new world has been left to his young protégé, Vin, the former street urchin who is now the most powerful Mistborn in the land, and to the idealistic young nobleman she loves.

books.title: The Final Empire
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: For a thousand years the ash fell and no flowers bloomed. For a thousand years the Skaa slaved in misery and lived in fear. For a thousand years the Lord Ruler, the 'Sliver of Infinity,' reigned with absolute power and ultimate terror, divinely invincible.

books.title: Necronomicon
books.author: H.P. Lovecraft
books.description: WIKIPEDIA: Lovecraft scholar Robert M. Price described The Necronomicon as 'the greatest imaginative achievement in modern horror fiction,' and it is universally acknowledged as Lovecraft's masterpiece.

books.title: Dracula
books.author: Bram Stoker
books.description: When Jonathan Harker visits Transylvania to help Count Dracula purchase a London house, he makes horrifying discoveries in his client's castle. Soon afterwards, disturbing incidents unfold in England: a ship runs aground on the shores of Whitby, its crew vanished; beautiful Lucy Westenra slowly succumbs to a mysterious, wasting illness, her blood drained away; and the lunatic Renfield raves about the imminent arrival of his 'master'.

books.title: Calamity
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: When Calamity lit up the sky, the Epics were born. David's fate has been tied to their villainy ever since that historic night. Steelheart killed his father. Firefight stole his heart. And now Regalia has turned his closest ally into a dangerous enemy.

books.title: Firefight
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: Newcago is free. They told David it was impossible, that even the Reckoners had never killed a High Epic. Yet Steelheart—invincible, immortal, unconquerable—is dead. And he died by David's hand.

books.title: Steelheart
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: Ten years ago, Calamity came. It was a burst in the sky that gave ordinary men and women extraordinary powers. The awed public started calling them Epics. But Epics are no friend of man. With incredible gifts came the desire to rule. And to rule man you must crush his will.

books.title: Morning Star
books.author: Pierce Brown
books.description: Darrow would have lived in peace, but his enemies brought him war. The Gold overlords demanded his obedience, hanged his wife, and enslaved his people. But Darrow is determined to fight back.

books.title: Golden Son
books.author: Pierce Brown
books.description: As a Red, Darrow grew up working the mines deep beneath the surface of Mars, enduring backbreaking labor while dreaming of the better future he was building for his descendants. But the Society he faithfully served was built on lies.

books.title: Red Rising
books.author: Pierce Brown
books.description: Darrow is a Red, a member of the lowest caste in the color-coded society of the future. Like his fellow Reds, he works all day, believing that he and his people are making the surface of Mars livable for future generations.

books.title: The Egg
books.author: Andy Weir
books.description: You were on your way home when you died. It was a car accident. Nothing particularly remarkable, but fatal nonetheless. You left behind a wife and two children. It was a painless death. The EMTs tried their best to save you, but to no avail.

books.title: Braving Britannia: Tales of Life, Love, and Adventure in Ultima Online
books.author: Wes Locher
books.description: In 1997, Origin Systems and Electronic Arts released one of the most influential video games of all time: Ultima Online. This massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) was the first of its kind to reach a large audience.

books.title: Sprint: How to Solve Big Problems and Test New Ideas in Just Five Days
books.author: Jake Knapp
books.description: From three design partners at Google Ventures, a unique five-day process for solving tough problems using design, prototyping, and testing ideas with customers.

books.title: The Carrot Principle
books.author: Adrian Gostick & Chester Elton
books.description: The Carrot Principle illustrates how ordinary organizations have made the leap to extraordinary results by building a culture of recognition.

books.title: Project to Product
books.author: Mik Kersten
books.description: In Project to Product, Value Stream Network pioneer and technology business leader Dr. Mik Kersten introduces the Flow Framework—a new way of seeing, measuring, and managing software delivery.

books.title: Making Work Visible
books.author: Dominica DeGrandis
books.description: If someone stole your wallet, you'd notice it. So why don't people notice when they are robbed of something much more valuable than their wallet—time?

books.title: Edgedancer
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: Three years ago, Lift asked a goddess to stop her from growing older--a wish she believed was granted. Now, in Edgedancer, the barely teenage nascent Knight Radiant finds that time stands still for no one.

books.title: Building a StoryBrand
books.author: Donald Miller
books.description: Donald Miller's StoryBrand process is a proven solution to the struggle business leaders face when talking about their businesses. This revolutionary method for connecting with customers provides readers with the ultimate competitive advantage.

books.title: Mitosis
books.author: Brandon Sanderson
books.description: Mitosis is a short story set in the world of The Reckoners, taking place between the events of Steelheart and Firefight.

books.title: Lullaby
books.author: Chuck Palahniuk
books.description: Ever heard of a culling song? It's a lullaby sung in Africa to give a painless death to the old or infirm. The lyrics of a culling song kill, whether spoken or even just thought.

books.title: Blue Ocean Shift
books.author: W. Chan Kim & Renée Mauborgne
books.description: Drawing on more than a decade of new work, Kim and Mauborgne show you how to move beyond competing, inspire your people's confidence, and seize new growth.

books.title: I Am Legend
books.author: Richard Matheson
books.description: Robert Neville is the last living man on Earth...but he is not alone. Every other man, woman, and child on Earth has become a vampire, and they are all hungry for Neville's blood.

books.title: The Startup Way
books.author: Eric Ries
books.description: In The Startup Way, he turns his attention to a new group of organizations: established enterprises like iconic multinationals GE and Toyota, tech titans like Amazon and Facebook, and the next generation of Silicon Valley upstarts like Airbnb and Twilio.

books.title: The Lean Startup
books.author: Eric Ries
books.description: Most startups fail. But many of those failures are preventable. The Lean Startup is a new approach being adopted across the globe, changing the way companies are built and new products are launched.

books.title: How to Win Friends and Influence People
books.author: Dale Carnegie
books.description: You can go after the job you want—and get it! You can take the job you have—and improve it! You can take any situation—and make it work for you!

books.title: Give and Take
books.author: Adam Grant
books.description: For generations, we have focused on the individual drivers of success: passion, hard work, talent, and luck. But in today's dramatically reconfigured world, success is increasingly dependent on how we interact with others.

books.title: Leaders Eat Last
books.author: Simon Sinek
books.description: Imagine a world where almost everyone wakes up inspired to go to work, feels trusted and valued during the day, then returns home feeling fulfilled. This is not a crazy, idealized notion.

books.title: The DevOps Handbook
books.author: Gene Kim, Jez Humble, Patrick Debois, & John Willis
books.description: More than ever, the effective management of technology is critical for business competitiveness. For decades, technology leaders have struggled to balance agility, reliability, and security.

books.title: Rework
books.author: Jason Fried & David Heinemeier Hansson
books.description: Most business books give you the same old advice: Write a business plan, study the competition, seek investors, yadda yadda. If you're looking for a book like that, put this one back on the shelf.

books.title: Unsouled
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: Sacred artists follow a thousand Paths to power, using their souls to control the forces of the natural world. Lindon is Unsouled, forbidden to learn the sacred arts of his clan.

books.title: Frankenstein
books.author: Mary Shelley
books.description: Mary Shelley's seminal novel of the scientist whose creation becomes a monster. This edition is the original 1818 text, which preserves the hard-hitting and politically charged aspects of Shelley's original writing.

books.title: The Giver
books.author: Lois Lowry
books.description: The Giver, the 1994 Newbery Medal winner, has become one of the most influential novels of our time. The haunting story centers on twelve-year-old Jonas, who lives in a seemingly ideal, if colorless, world of conformity and contentment.

books.title: Traction
books.author: Gabriel Weinberg & Justin Mares
books.description: Most startups don't fail because they can't build a product. Most startups fail because they can't get traction. Startup advice tends to be a lot of platitudes repackaged with new buzzwords, but Traction is something else entirely.

books.title: Staff Engineer
books.author: Will Larson
books.description: At most technology companies, you'll reach Senior Software Engineer, the career level for software engineers, in five to eight years. At that career level, you'll no longer be judged primarily on your technical skills.

books.title: Team Topologies
books.author: Matthew Skelton & Manuel Pais
books.description: In Team Topologies, IT consultants Matthew Skelton and Manuel Pais share secrets of successful team patterns and interactions to help readers choose and evolve the right team patterns for their organization.

books.title: Soulsmith
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: Outside Sacred Valley, ancient ruins rise from the earth, drawing sacred artists from miles around to fight for the treasures within. Lindon has reached Copper, taking the first step on the road to power, but the warriors of the outside world are still far beyond him.

books.title: Blackflame
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: Lindon has a year left. When his time runs out, he'll have to fight an opponent that no one believes he can beat. Unless he learns sacred arts the right way, from scratch, he won't have a chance to win...and even then, the odds are against him.

books.title: Skysworn
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: As the Uncrowned King tournament reaches its final rounds, tensions between the competing factions are higher than ever. The outcome may determine the power balance throughout the rest of the world.

books.title: Ghostwater
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: Long ago, the Monarch Northstrider created a world of his own. This world, known as Ghostwater, housed some of his most valuable experiments. Now, it has been damaged by the attack of the Dreadgod, and a team of Skysworn have been sent to recover whatever they can from the dying world.

books.title: Underlord
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: A tournament approaches. All around the world, great clans and sects prepare their disciples to fight against one another in a competition of young Underlords. Even the Blackflame Empire is drawn in, but their youth are not strong enough to compete.

books.title: Uncrowned
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: Emriss Silentborn, Memory of the World. Tiberian Arelius, the fallen Patriarch. Akura Malice, Queen of Shadows. Seshethkunaaz, King of Dragons. Reigan Shen, Emperor of Lions. Luminous Queen Sha Miara. The Eight-Man Empire. Northstrider. The Monarchs, the most powerful sacred artists in the world, rule with unquestioned authority. They are mysterious and distant, and catching a glimpse of one is privilege enough for a lifetime.

books.title: Wintersteel
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: As the Uncrowned King tournament reaches its final rounds, tensions between the competing factions are higher than ever. The outcome may determine the power balance throughout the rest of the world.

books.title: Bloodline
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: It's time to go back home. In the years since Lindon left Sacred Valley, he has attained power beyond anything his family thought possible. Now he'll have to put those powers to the test, because a Dreadgod is on its way.

books.title: Reaper
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: The Monarchs have been preparing a weapon that could destroy the world...and the world's only hope is the Sacred Artists who have spent their lives learning to steal from the rich.

books.title: Dreadgod
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: The battle in the heavens has left a target on Lindon's back. His most reliable ally is gone, the Monarchs see him as a threat, and he has inherited one of the most valuable facilities in the world. At any moment, his enemies could band together to kill him.

books.title: Waybound
books.author: Will Wight
books.description: All his life, Lindon has searched for a way to defeat the Dreadgods and protect his home. Now, he's the only one with a chance of succeeding. The Monarchs have been defeated, and Lindon has inherited their powers. Now, he is facing the most difficult challenge of his life.
